## Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```

## Load data
```{r}
df_sales <- readxl::read_xlsx('../data/df_sales_1.xlsx')
# data <- mtcars
```

## Linear Regression 

### Split Data into Traning and Test Set
Create an 80/20 train-test split using the `createDataPartition` function. 
```{r}
# Set seed to ensure reproducibility
set.seed(123)  

split <- createDataPartition(df_sales$ID, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)
train_data <- df_sales[split, ]
test_data <- df_sales[-split, ]
```

### Train the Linear Regression Model

```{r}
# Fit a linear regression model
model <- lm(sales_2023 ~ sales_2020 + Age, data = df_sales)  # Predict mpg using weight (wt) and horsepower (hp)

# View model summary
summary(model)
```
